entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
